purpose: Launch the TITAN Merch Store with 100% of proceeds going to Action For Humanity - International, positioning TITAN as a movement that stands for something bigger than just software.
core_message: This is more than just merch. It's a movement. Wear TITAN. Stand for something bigger. 100% of proceeds go directly to Action For Humanity - International.
summary: Carousel post launching the TITAN Merch Store, featuring hoodies, t-shirts, hats, socks, and mugs. All proceeds support Action For Humanity's emergency relief, education, healthcare, and sustainable development projects.
